code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] --> AuthInitial

    state "AuthCubit States" as AuthFlow {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
        AuthLoading --> AuthSuccess: loginSuccess(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
        AuthLoading --> AuthFailure: loginError(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
        AuthSuccess --> AuthLoading: logout(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
        AuthSuccess --> ProfileUpdating: updateProfile(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
        ProfileUpdating --> AuthSuccess: updateSuccess(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
        ProfileUpdating --> AuthFailure: updateError(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
        AuthFailure --> AuthLoading: retry(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
        AuthLoading --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]: dispose(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    }

    [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> CortesInitial

    state "CortesCubit States" as CortesFlow {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
        CortesLoading --> CortesLoaded: loadSuccess(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
        CortesLoading --> CortesError: loadError(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
        CortesLoaded --> CortesLoaded: selectSegmento(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
        CortesLoaded --> CortesLoading: refreshCortes(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
        CortesError --> CortesLoading: retry(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
        CortesLoading --> [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]: dispose(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    }

    [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> QuizInitial

    state "QuizCubit States" as QuizFlow {IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
        QuizLoading --> QuizLoaded: quizGenerated(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
        QuizLoading --> QuizError: generationError(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
        QuizLoaded --> QuizLoaded: submitAnswer(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
        QuizLoaded --> QuizFinished: completeQuiz(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
        QuizError --> QuizLoading: retry(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
        QuizFinished --> QuizInitial: reset(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
        QuizLoading --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]: dispose(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    }
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
